summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Optra AI - Emergent platform clone. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all authentication, credit system, project management, and Razorpay integration working correctly. Frontend UI is 90% functional with excellent user experience, but WebSocket real-time chat functionality is not working, which blocks the core AI website generation feature.

integration_issues.issue: WebSocket connection to '/ws/chat' fails - core AI generation feature not working
integration_issues.details: WebSocket endpoint returns HTML instead of establishing WebSocket connection. Kubernetes ingress may not be configured for WebSocket routing.

design_issues.issue: Missing accessibility description for project creation dialog
design_issues.details: Console warning about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent

passed_tests: Live preview and code view tabs
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix WebSocket connection for real-time chat functionality. The WebSocket endpoint '/ws/chat' is not working - it returns HTML instead of establishing WebSocket connection. This blocks the core AI website generation feature. Likely issue: Kubernetes ingress configuration for WebSocket routing. Also fix minor accessibility warning for dialog components.
